Carlsbad.Park Hyatt Resort Aviara:
Aviara, in Carlsbad, California, is part of the Park Hyatt hotel chain. Prior to June 21, 2010, it was part of the Toronto-based Four Seasons chain of luxury hotels and resorts.


== History ==
Completed in 1997, Aviara was designed in Spanish Colonial architecture and set on plateau overlooking the Batiquitos Lagoon and Wildlife Preserve.
